scripts.build: pnpm --filter shell-backend --filter shell-frontend --filter explore-backend --filter explore-frontend --filter checkout-backend --filter checkout-frontend --filter decide-backend --filter decide-frontend run build
scripts.build:mfes: pnpm --filter explore-frontend run build && pnpm --filter checkout-frontend run build && pnpm --filter decide-frontend run build
scripts.dev:backends: concurrently -c dim,red,blue,cyan "pnpm --filter explore-backend run dev" "pnpm --filter shell-backend run start:dev" "pnpm --filter checkout-backend run dev" "pnpm --filter decide-backend run dev"
scripts.dev:frontends: concurrently -c green,yellow,magen`ta,white "pnpm --filter explore-frontend run dev" "pnpm --filter shell-frontend run dev" "pnpm --filter checkout-frontend run dev" "pnpm --filter decide-frontend run dev"
scripts.prod: pnpm run build && concurrently -c dim,red,green,blue "pnpm --filter shell-backend run prod" "pnpm --filter explore-backend run prod" "pnpm --filter decide-backend run prod" "pnpm --filter checkout-backend run prod"
